[@microsoft/fast-element/di.js](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [ParentLocator](../fast-element.parentlocator/index.html)

## ParentLocator type

A function capable of locating the parent container based on a container's owner.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ParentLocator = (owner: any) => Container | null;
```
**References:** [Container](../fast-element.container/)

## Remarks

A container owner is usually an HTMLElement instance.
